amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, $5,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, Navy, for the design, development, and test of improvements to the towed array handler.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1395 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1395 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S8651-8653; text: CR S8652) To make available, with an offset, $5,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, Navy, for the design, development, and test of improvements to the towed array handler.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1395 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1395 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
